My Fault Cover Art

30 January 2020 | graphic

Cover art for the song ‘My fault’ by C47eb

Listen to C47eb on Spotify

Inspiration

My direction was to have C47eb being pickup up by a ufo. How I did that was up to me. I took some inspiration form retro UFO spotting pictures like tis one and added my own psychedelic twist.

I started the cover with a photo of C47eb and a general direction, and the rest was up to me. For most projects I work on I get my images from UnSplash because of the quality of the photography and the CC copyright policy. That was the case for this project as well.
